creator: alexeys@inventigo.com
text:
It would be also good to be able to specify a flag not to use the default
exclusion list in delete task.

If you mean defaultexcludes attribute, you have to specify it in all filesets.
Even more there seems no way to change default excludes in ANT.
creator: alexeys@inventigo.com

text:
Starting with a nightly build of sometime last week, there is a <defaultexcludes>
task.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
